bug.author: WayneHsiao0225
bug.summary: the multirotor crashed under AirSim-Drone-Racing-Lab environment
bug.description:
hi, I ran the code (AirSim/PythonClient/multirotor/path.py) under AirSim-Drone-Racing-Lab( <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim-Drone-Racing-Lab>https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim-Drone-Racing-Lab</denchmark-link> ). The map was "soccer field _easy ". Initially, the multirotor was in the box. I pressed backspace on keyboard to reset the position of multirotor. (picture1) But, my problem is that the multirotor crashed before it landed.(picture 2). Would be nice if someone answer it. Thanks you ! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45175782/90465678-74aff080-e142-11ea-8175-f39d4b3acc9e.png></denchmark-link>
(picture1) <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45175782/90465704-7f6a8580-e142-11ea-8b9b-465aec224b8c.png></denchmark-link>
(picture2) os: ubuntu20.04.1 airsim 1.3.1 unreal lastest

comments.comment: Issue should probably be opened against that repository itself
